title: Why is fiora still allowed in urf
body:
Blindly dived into a 5v1 under tower and got a quad....penta ran to the fountian, why is she still enabled? this is absurd
To the people reading this, I'm not complaining, I'm questioning riots logic behind this

replies.body: Because urf ends in one more day so can you stop complaining
im laughing my ass off, i got flamed so hard for this, just wondering why it wasnt addressed to begin with, shes worse then going against teemo, shaco, eve, syndra and amumu

That's because you're complaining about balance in a mode not meant for balance.


you see the irony yet?
? i got flamed for playing "an easy champion" in urf
So? It's URF. Nothing is balanced.
True, but theres not being balanced and then theirs having the ability to 1v5, even in urf i believe no champ should be allowed to do this

Everyone gets 80% cdr, no mana/energy source, 100% bonus attack speed on everyone & passive experience & gold gain, and you think that her pentakilling people in a joke mode is the problem....

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/175/315/PicardDoubleFacepalm-1.jpg
well, i dont think its a very fun experience to the team opposing fiora to play urf in black and white

So you thought getting EQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ by Urgot is fun?

So you thought Wukong & Vlad constantly spamming W to dodge attacks with their Invisibility/Untargetable kit is fun?

So you thought Fizz & Shen spamming E to zoom around places or running away from you at low HP is fun?

It's URF. You're meant to get rekt by something which is 100% imbalanced.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wn0P3Zoe,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-27T08:43:55.749+0000)
>
> So you thought getting EQQQQQQQQQQQQQQQ by Urgot is fun?
> 
> So you thought Wukong & Vlad constantly spamming W to dodge attacks with their Invisibility/Untargetable kit is fun?
> 
> So you thought Fizz & Shen spamming E to zoom around places or running away from you at low HP is fun?
> 
> It's URF. You're meant to get rekt by something which is 100% imbalanced.

THIS.
wait till you get a load of irelia then with triforce and guinsoos
fiora is worse, she gets free immortality every 3 seconds

> [{quoted}](name=Xavanic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wn0P3Zoe,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-27T08:34:46.649+0000)
>
> fiora is worse, she gets free immortality every 3 seconds

Yeah and she needs to stand still. Why not spam your mobility spells to get out the way?
Irelia on urf on the other hand wont give a damn if you stun her or not.
i dunno, i dont have to worry much about cc when playing fiora, most ppl die in .2 seconds, .5 if i fuck up
